trans-unit.source: Represents the different data-entry modes of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer ulike dataregistrering modusene for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The FormViewMode enumeration is used to represent the data-entry modes of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Opplistingen FormViewMode brukes til å representere dataregistrering modusene for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the current mode of the control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å fastslå gjeldende modus for kontrollen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: After an insert or update operation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control returns to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Etter en innsettingen eller oppdateringen operasjon i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen returnerer modusen som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: By default, the control returns to read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: Som standard returnerer kontrollen til skrivebeskyttet modus.

trans-unit.source: You can specify an alternate mode to return to by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi en alternativ modus for å gå tilbake til ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change modes programmatically, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ChangeMode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre modus programmatisk, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ChangeMode%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ChangeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control changes modes, the events in the following table are raised.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen endrer modi, aktiveres hendelser i følgende tabell.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: |Event|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>|Occurs when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the mode actually changes.
trans-unit.target: | Hendelsen | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>| Forekommer når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen prøver å endre mellom Rediger, insert og skrivebeskyttet modus, men før modusen endres faktisk.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel a mode change.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>|Occurs after a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control has changed from edit, insert, or read-only mode to another mode.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å avbryte en endring. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>| Inntreffer etter en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er endret fra Rediger, innsetting eller read-only-modus til en annen modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to perform a task when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control changes modes.|
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen ofte brukes til å utføre en oppgave når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen endrer modi. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: An editing mode that allows the user to update the values of an existing record.
trans-unit.target: En modus for redigering av som gir brukeren mulighet til å oppdatere verdiene i en eksisterende post.

trans-unit.source: An inserting mode that allows the user to enter the values for a new record.
trans-unit.target: En innsetting modus som gir brukeren mulighet til å angi verdiene for en ny post.

trans-unit.source: A display mode that prevents the user from modifying the values of a record.
trans-unit.target: En visningsmodus som hindrer at brukeren å endre verdiene i en oppføring.
